verses.verse: And when Rehoboam<WH7346> was come<WH935> to Jerusalem<WH3389>, he assembled<WH6950> the house<WH1004> of Judah<WH3063> and Benjamin<WH1144>, a hundred<WH3967> and fourscore<WH8084> thousand<WH505> chosen<WH977> men<WH6213>, that were warriors, to fight<WH3898> against Israel<WH3478>, to bring<WH7725> the kingdom<WH4467> again<WH7725> to Rehoboam<WH7346>.
